title: Text Extractor
subtitle: Extract text from images (OCR simulation)
supportedFormats: Supported formats: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP
ocrInfo: OCR (Optical Character Recognition) technology converts different types of documents, such as scanned paper documents, PDF files or images captured by a digital camera into editable and searchable data.
